H0.text: 0°C is the boiling point of water in degrees Celsius.

H1.text: 32°C is the boiling point of water in degrees Celsius.

H2.text: 100°C is the boiling point of water in degrees Celsius.

H3.text: 212°C is the boiling point of water in degrees Celsius.

A4.text: At sea level, the boiling point of water is 100 °C (212 °F).
